newsitem.title: PERU: Peru's wholesale prices rise 0.97 pct in November.
newsitem.headline: Peru's wholesale prices rise 0.97 pct in November.

text.p: Peru's wholesale prices rose 0.97 percent in November, up from 0.70 percent in the same month last year and from 1.20 percent in October, the National Institute of Statistics and Information (INEI) said Monday.
In the first 11 months of 1996, wholesale prices rose 10.75 percent, up from 8.50 percent in the same period of 1996.
In 1995, accumulated inflation for wholesale prices was 8.80 percent, down from 10.50 percent the previous year.
